entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain mixed with snow this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h this morning. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 8.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
